0:
Craig Burley believes Mason Mount must be regretting leaving Chelsea:

"Mason Mount, obviously he’s had an injury ravaged season, but even when he’s been fit he looks like who’s like oh my god I’ve just made one of the biggest… Not that Chelsea are great, they’re not.

But as a player you make a decision and how decision he thought was going to a club that were on the front foot. Whilst he’s been poor himself and he’s been out, he’s got to be thinking to himself I’ve made a terrible move here."

{ESPN FC}
